name: Mike Howard
description: love all good things of life, i love taking good care of myself and my partner especially spoiling her with surprises all the time, i am loving, honest, loyal and devoted to having a very serious relationship that would lead into something wonderful and i expect my partner to be also loving caring, honest and supportive as well.communication is very important to me as well so be ready to communicate regularly with me, if this is exactly what you re looking for please feel free to send me a direct message and i will definitely respond
